hero.title: Faka Ishishini Lakho Kwi-intanethi.
hero.subtitle: Ngokukhawuleza. Ngokungabizi. Kulula.
hero.description: Sinceda amashishini amancane eMzantsi Afrika ukuba aphumelele ngeewebhusayithi, i-AI automation, kunye nezixhobo zedijithali—ngaphandle kwexabiso elikhulu learhente enkulu.

painPoints.title: Kuvakala Kuqhelekile?
painPoints.subtitle: Ezi ziingxaki esizisombululayo yonke imihla kumashishini aseMzantsi Afrika afana nowakho

noWebsite.title: Akukho Webhusayithi Okanye Indala
noWebsite.description: Abakhuphisana nawe baseku-intanethi. Wena akunjalo. Okanye okubi—iwebhusayithi yakho ijongeka ngathi ivela kwi-2010.
noWebsite.solution: Fumana iwebhusayithi yale mihla, esebenza kwiifowuni ngeentsuku.

missingAutomation.title: Ulahlekelwa Kwi-Automation
missingAutomation.description: Uchitha iiyure kwimisebenzi ephindaphindwayo njengokuphendula imibuzo yabathengi okanye ukucwangcisa.
missingAutomation.solution: Yenza izenzekelayo nge-AI chatbots kunye neendlela zokusebenza ezihlakaniphile.

cantReach.title: Awukwazi Ukufikelela Yonke Imarike Yakho
cantReach.description: UMzantsi Afrika uneelwimi ezininzi, kodwa iwebhusayithi yakho ithetha isiNgesi kuphela.
cantReach.solution: Qhagamshelana nabathengi ngesiZulu, isiXhosa, isiBhulu, nokunye.

tooExpensive.title: Itekhnoloji Ibiza Kakhulu
tooExpensive.description: Unikwe iqaphelo le-R50,000+ lokwakha iwebhusayithi esisiseko. Olo hayi lokuzenzekelayo kwishishini elincinci.
tooExpensive.solution: Izisombululo ezikhawulezayo, ezingabizi ezilungiselelwe uhlahlo-lwabiwo mali lwakho.

services.title: Sinokukwenzela Ntoni
services.subtitle: Izisombululo zetekhnoloji ezisebenzayo ezikhulisa ishishini lakho

website.description: Iiwebhusayithi zale mihla, eziphendulayo ezisebenza kuwo nawuphi na isixhobo. Iinketho zeelwimi ezininzi ziyafumaneka.

aiAutomation.description: Inkonzo yabathengi ye-24/7 ngaphandle kokuqesha abasebenzi abongezelelekileyo. Yenza ngokuzenzekelayo imisebenzi ephindaphindayo.

customApps.description: Izicelo ezilula ezisombulula iingxaki ezithile zeshishini lakho.

googleBusiness.description: Fumaneka kwi-Google Maps nakwi-Search. Kubalulekile kumashishini angakummandla.

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukuphucula Ishishini Lakho?
cta.description: Fumana ingcebiso neqaphelo lasimahla. Akukho xinizelelo, ingcebiso enyanisekileyo kuphela ngokusebenzela ishishini lakho.

hero.title: Iinkonzo Ezikhulisa Ishishini Lakho
hero.subtitle: Ngokukhawuleza, ngokungabizi, kwaye kunempela kuluncedo. Khetha into oyifunayo—okanye udibanise ukuze ufumane impembelelo enkulu.

website.title: Ukwakhiwa Nokuphuculwa Kwewebhusayithi
website.tagline: Ivenkile yakho yedijithali esebenza imini nobusuku
website.description: Iwebhusayithi yobuchwephesha ayiseyonto yokuzidlalisa—ibalulekile. Sakha iiwebhusayithi ezikhawulezayo, zale mihla, ezisebenza kwiifowuni ezizisa abathengi ngokoqobo.
features: Uyilo oluphendulayo (lujongeka kakuhle kwiifowuni, iithebhulethi, iikhompyutha)
Iinketho zeelwimi ezininzi (isiNgesi, isiZulu, isiXhosa, isiBhulu, njl.)

aiAutomation.title: I-AI Automation Kunye Nee-chatbot
aiAutomation.description: Yeka ukuchitha iiyure kwimisebenzi ephindaphindwayo. Izisombululo zethu ze-AI zijongana nemibuzo yabathengi, zihlole abakhokeli, kwaye zenze umsebenzi uzenzekele—ukuze ukwazi ukugxila ekukhuliseni ishishini.
features: Inkxaso yabathengi ye-24/7 ngaphandle kwabasebenzi abongezelelekileyo

customApps.title: Iinkqubo Zokusebenza Ezakhiwe Ngokwezifiso Kunye Nezixhobo
customApps.description: Ufuna into ethile ekhethekileyo? Sakha iinkqubo zokusebenza ezilula, ezisebenza kakuhle ezilungiselelwe indlela yakho yokusebenza—iinkqubo zokubhuqa, abalondolozi bezinto, iiportali zabathengi, nokunye.

googleBusiness.title: Ukuseta Iprofayile Yeshishini Le-Google
googleBusiness.description: Vela xa abantu bommandla wakho befuna into oyinikezayo. Siphucula iprofayile yakho yeshishini le-Google ukuze uvele kwiMephu nakuPhendlo.

digitalMarketing.title: Iipakethi Zokuqala Zokuthengisa Ngedijithali
digitalMarketing.description: Ukuthengisa okulula, okusebenza kakuhle okuhambelana nohlahlo-lwabiwo mali lwakho. Ukuseta iinkundla zentlalo, iziseko ze-Google Ads, amaphulo e-imeyile—sikuqalisa ngendlela efanelekileyo.

consulting.title: Ingcebiso Yotshintsho Lwedijithali
consulting.description: Awuqiniseki ukuba uza kuqala phi? Siza kuhlola ishishini lakho, sibone amathuba, kwaye senze irodi yempumelelo yokukhula kwedijithali—akukho jargon, ingcebiso ecacileyo kuphela.

whyUs.title: Kutheni Usebenza Nathi?
whyUs.subtitle: Asifani neeoarhente ezikhulu ezineemvume zeenyanga ezi-6 kunye nejargon yenkampani

fastDelivery.title: Ukuhanjiswa Ngokukhawuleza
fastDelivery.description: Uninzi lweeprojekthi zihanjiswa ngeentsuku, hayi iinyanga. Uza kubona iziphumo ngokukhawuleza.

clearComm.title: Unxibelelwano Olucacileyo
clearComm.description: Akukho jargon yetekhnoloji. Sicacisa yonke into ngolwimi olulula ukuze uqonde ncakasana ukuba ufumana ntoni.

results.title: Kugxilwe Kwiziphumo
results.description: Sakha izinto ezinceda ishishini lakho likhule ngokoqobo—abathengi abaningi, umsebenzi omncinci ngezandla, ukubonakala okungcono.

services.ctaDescription: Bhuqa ingcebiso yasimahla. Siza kuxoxa ngeenjongo zakho zeshishini kwaye sicebise izisombululo ezingcono zohlahlo-lwabiwo mali lwakho.

hero.title: Iziphumo Zokwenyaniso Zamashishini Okwenyaniso
hero.subtitle: Bona indlela esincede ngayo amashishini amancane aseMzantsi Afrika akhule ngezisombululo zetekhnoloji ezisebenzayo

testimonials.title: Into Abathengi Bethu Abayithethayo
testimonials.subtitle: Musa ukuthatha ilizwi lethu kuphela—nanku into abanini bamashishini bokwenyaniso abayithethayo

portfolio.ctaDescription: Masixoxe ngeenjongo zakho zeshishini kwaye senze isicwangciso esisebenza ngokwenene.

hero.title: Sinceda Amashishini aseMzantsi Afrika Aphumelele Kwi-intanethi
hero.subtitle: Izisombululo zetekhnoloji ezikhawulezayo, ezingabizi ngaphandle kwe-nonsense yenkampani

strengths.title: Amandla Ethu
strengths.subtitle: Yintoni esenza sohluke kubanye ababoneleli betekhnoloji

whySA.title: Kutheni Amashishini aseMzantsi Afrika Efuna Izisombululo Zedijithali
whySA.subtitle: Inyani yeshishini elincinci eMzantsi Afrika namhlanje

approach.title: Indlela Yethu Yokuhanjiswa Ngokukhawuleza
approach.subtitle: Indlela esifumana ngayo iziphumo ngokukhawuleza ngaphandle kokuphazamisa umgangatho

about.ctaDescription: Ukulungele ukuphucula ishishini lakho ngeentsuku, hayi iinyanga? Masixoxe—akukho xinizelelo, ingcebiso enyanisekileyo kuphela.

hero.title: Masakheni Into Entle Kunye
hero.subtitle: Fumana iqaphelo lasimahla nengcebiso enyanisekileyo. Akukho xinizelelo, akukho jargon.

form.title: Fumana Iqaphelo Lasimahla
form.description: Gcwalisa ifomu elingezantsi kwaye siza kubuyela kuwe ngaphakathi kweeyure ezingama-24 nesiphakimiso esicacileyo.
form.name: Igama Lakho
form.messagePlaceholder: Ufuna uncedo ngantoni? Zeziphi iinjongo zakho?
form.successMessage: Sifumene umyalezo wakho kwaye siza kubuyela kuwe ngaphakathi kweeyure ezingama-24.

whatsappCta.title: Ukhetha I-WhatsApp?
whatsappCta.description: Fumana iimpendulo ezikhawulezayo kwimibuzo yakho. Thetha nathi ngoku!

footer.description: Izisombululo zetekhnoloji ezikhawulezayo, ezingabizi zamashishini aseMzantsi Afrika. Sinceda ii-SME ziphumelele kwixesha ledijithali.
